description: Answers user queries by searching across DPDPA, IT Act 2000, IT Act 2008, and MeitY website knowledge bases. Provides compliance guidance, cross-framework precedence analysis, and source-cited responses.

example_response.answer: The main legal answer with provisions and analysis

sources.act: Name of the act (DPDPA, IT Act 2000, IT Act 2008)
sources.description: Brief description of the relevant provision

example_response.cross_framework_analysis: Analysis of how different frameworks interact for this query
example_response.precedence_notes: Notes on which framework takes precedence if there are conflicts
